href="/receita/pure-de-banana-da-terra-leite-de-coco-gengibre"><div class="thumbnail thumbnail__tile"><img alt="Imagem da receita" class="thumbnail-img" defaultimage="/assets/img/img-placeholder.png"></div><p class="tag">ARES TAILANDESES</p><h3>Purê de banana-da-terra com leite de coco e gengibre</h3></a></article><!----><!----></div><div class="col-sm-4 col-xs-6 quarter-gutter-xs ng-star-inserted"><!----><article class="tile ng-star-inserted"><a class="tile-action" title="Panqueca americana de banana-da-terra" Barattino </h3></a></article><!----><!----></div></div></content-block></section><section class="ng-star-inserted"><!----><ad-unit class="ads-banner-large ng-star-inserted"
